Reviews.Title: “Perfect for us”

Reviews.Content: stayed 9 nights round world trip garden free upgrade hadnt offered marc manager free wifi air con iron coffeetea facilities safe flat screen tv fridge neat clean comfortable location fantastic nice safe lovely little cafes nice eat bus stops 100 yards sydney harbour 10 minutes bus 25 minute walk beach 15 minute bus ride opposite direction lovely shops chic trendy market expensive window shop dont miss arts craft market saturday loads hand paintings etc enjoyed stay
